name: Beyond Repair
description:
STORY:

a devastating world war engulfed the globe involving the use of nuclear mass destruction weaponry, and a new technology was put forth to development in the hopes of preserving mankind last remnants,   a technology that proved too late .

alone, confused, and clueless the last soul would wake-up in one of those husk suits that act as the flesh and blood host with the intent of preventing the equilibrium state, which is known to us as ("death") .

a constant struggle for maintaining energy as you explore the facility's labs looking for answers .

GAME BUILD:

the game  as for now is not playable and very early in development, what has been done so far is a very simple sketch mostly fixated on graphical development

 TEST LEVEL:

the downloadable content in this page is for the test level of the game, it is not playable nor meant to be at this stage, but the option is there in case you wish to check it out, the main idea of publishing unfinished game such as this is to share the process with others that carry the same passion .
